subject: Golf
United States Women's Open (Golf)
Weather
lead_paragraph: Golfers at the United States Women’s Open had to overcome temperatures of more than 100 degrees, which slowed play to a snail’s crawl, turning a normal four-hour round into a six-hour ordeal.
snippet: Golfers at the United States Women’s Open had to overcome temperatures of more than 100 degrees, which slowed play to a snail’s crawl, turning a normal four-hour round into a six-hour ordeal.
